title: Introduction to Workshop
description: In-depth analysis of workshop principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Introduction to Applications
description: In-depth analysis of applications principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Intermediate Workshop
description: Advanced exploration of workshop covering current research and industry practices.

title: Applied Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Methods
description: Rigorous treatment of methods theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Practice
description: In-depth analysis of practice principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Practice
description: In-depth analysis of practice principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Theory
description: Rigorous treatment of theory theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Special Topics in Theory
description: In-depth analysis of theory principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: POLS 315 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Analysis
description: Advanced exploration of analysis covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: POLS 337 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Practice
description: Advanced exploration of practice covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: POLS 389 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Applications
description: Interdisciplinary approach to applications combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Graduate Methods

prerequisites: POLS 317 and senior standing or graduate status
